section.title: HW: Career Fair
section.p: One of the great traditions of Belhaven University is the Major's Fair. Every year, the different academic departments market what their programs offer to students.

subsection.title: Visiting the Major's Fair
subsection.p: Your assignment is to visit this year's Major Fair. Soak in the experience and answer the following exercises. Use the HW: Major Fair worksheet found on Canvas.

statement.p: List five departments that you visited.
Discuss any department you felt were particularly interesting. What interested you about their department?
What is something you learned at the Major Fair?
